title: Lemmon Gayle Tzemach - The Dressmaker of Khair Khana
description:
Publisher: Harper Perennial; Reprint edition (March 20, 2012)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0061732478
ISBN-13: 978-0061732478

Release Date: March 20, 2012 | Series: P.S.
Kamila Sidiqi's life changed overnight when the Taliban seized control of Afghanistan. After her father and brother were forced to flee, she became the sole breadwinner for her five siblings. Banned from school, confined to her home, and armed only with determination, she picked up a needle and thread to create a thriving business that saved their lives.

The Dressmaker of Khair Khana tells the incredible true story of this unlikely entrepreneur who mobilized her community under the Taliban. A story of war, it is also a story of family, faith, and resilience in the face of despair. These women are not victimsÃ¢â‚¬â€they are the glue that holds families together; they are the backbone and the heart of their nation. Kamila Sidiqi's journey will inspire you, but it will also change the way you think about one of the most important political and humanitarian issues of our time.
